title: Malphite size scaling with armor
body:
So, Malphite...

What do you think about having his size scale with armor? Zac grows with health, why wouldn't the enormous rock monster grow with something he synergies with. It'd add to his feel and add to the uniqueness of his character.

Thoughts???

Per TwoD: 

> [{quoted}](name=TwoD,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BFyBcdUp,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-06-28T04:35:14.055+0000)

Why? Elixir of Iron doesn't increase AA or cast range, neither does the cast range on any of Zac's skills when he has 6K health and is bigger than Baron.

Elixer of Iron technically does increase your AA range, but that is from the center of your model. Area of effect skills like Malphite's e would increase in diameter and his ultimate would as well since he himself is the projectile.
